logoutTitle: Are you sure you want to logout?
logoutDescription: If you log out, you will need to log in again to use your dashboard
courseWishlistTitle: You must be logged in to add to your favorites
courseWishlistDescription: To add a course to your favourites, you must be logged in first. Would you like to be redirected to the login page?
courseRateTitle: You must be logged in to rate
courseRateDescription: To rate a course, you must first login. Would you like to be redirected to the login page?
loginToApplyDescription: To apply for a course, you must first login. Would you like to be redirected to the login page?
applyToCourseDescription: Are you sure you want to apply to the course? Number of remaining applications: {{applyLimit}}
buyApplyDescription: Your number of applications is 0. To apply for a course, you must first purchase an application. Would you like to be redirected to purchase page?
accountUnsavedChangesDescription: You have unsaved changes, are you sure you want to continue?
